message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell. However, I can only afford to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is quite valuable to me. Could you meet me halfway at $17,500?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. While I understand its value, I am still unable to meet you above $15,000. Can we find a middle ground?
